file_name.description: the file name (only file name and extension no file path, e.g. my_image.jpg

x1.description: (x1,y1) is upper left point of default crop, in pixels (0,0) is upper left corner of image

y1.description: (x1,y1) is upper left point of default crop, in pixels (0,0) is upper left corner of image

x2.description: (x2,y2) is lower right point of default crop, in pixels (0,0) is upper left corner of image

y2.description: (x2,y2) is lower right point of default crop, in pixels (0,0) is upper left corner of image
